## LinearTransformation.apply() method

Apply the linear transformation to a vector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apply(vector: V): U;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector | <code>V</code> | A vector in the domain of the transformation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`U`

A vector in the image of the transformation
